subject: M7: Run full integration test suite
description:
Execute complete test suite to verify feature parity.

**Commands:**
```bash
# Build
cd zig && zig build

# Unit tests
zig build test

# Integration tests
cd .. && just zig-test
# Or: CC_QUERY=./zig/zig-out/bin/ccq ./test/test.sh

# Both implementations
just test-all
```

**Manual verification:**
```bash
# Interactive smoke test
./zig/zig-out/bin/ccq -d test/fixtures
cc-query> SELECT count(*) FROM messages;
cc-query> .schema
cc-query> .quit
```

**Output comparison:**
```bash
# Compare piped output
echo "SELECT count(*) FROM messages;" | node bin/cc-query.js -d test/fixtures > /tmp/node.out
echo "SELECT count(*) FROM messages;" | ./zig/zig-out/bin/ccq -d test/fixtures > /tmp/zig.out
diff /tmp/node.out /tmp/zig.out
```

**Checklist:**
- [ ] `zig build test` - all unit tests pass
- [ ] `just zig-test` - all integration tests pass
- [ ] `just test-all` - both Node and Zig pass
- [ ] Piped output matches Node
- [ ] Interactive mode works correctly
- [ ] No memory leaks (run with GPA leak detection)

**Acceptance criteria:**
- All tests pass
- Output matches Node.js
- No regressions
